Subject: Storing files in ARC-file larger than Integer.MAX_VALUE goes wrong
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=27093708; y=QR0bPMI-fUbSWJBuplKo0jBkXKEB8ZFjKrRyR2ZxgvsZ
X-Yahoo-Profile: svc400

Dear all.
We have for a while stored heritrix-logs in ARC-files as part of =
harvest-documentation, but we just found out
that storing files in an ARC-f=
ile larger than Integer.MAX_VALUE goes wrong, because the ARCWriter.write m=
ethods has recordlength as an int (2 GB - 1 byte), and trying to do so resu=
lts in a negative size.

Is this limit intended?

And should the ARCWriter(=
) accept negative recordLength-values?

regards
S=F8ren
-------------------=
--------------------------------------------------------
